alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:10PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Butler County through 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leon and El Dorado Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
